text: Lin Tzay-peir (born 20 February 1954) is a Taiwanese actor and television presenter. He won Best Actor at the 1985 Golden Bell Awards. ==Personal life== In 1988, Lin Tzay-peir married singer-actress Chang Kai-ling (張愷凌), better known by her stage name Tzu Lin (紫琳), after 9 years of dating. They starred in the 1988 TV series Walking Through the Past together. After 7 years of marriage they had a daughter, but divorced shortly afterwards, only to remarry 4 years later.
